sentences.en: Are there any tours for the Grand Canyon?
sentences.cn: 有到大峡谷的旅游团 吗 ?

sentences.en: As I relayed the yoga teacher incident, my voice echoed across the canyon between who I was and what I was saying.
sentences.cn: 我跟她说了瑜伽老师的事情之后，我感觉的声音像环绕在峡谷里，在我是谁和我在说什么之间回荡着。

sentences.en: Colorado River through the Grand Canyon.
sentences.cn: 科罗拉多河穿越大峡谷.

sentences.en: Far up the west rim of the canyon, a coyote yipped twice.
sentences.cn: 远处峡谷的西缘，一只丛林狼嚎叫了两声。

sentences.en: He felt wonder mingled with awe at the Grand Canyon.
sentences.cn: 面对着大峡谷,他又惊奇又敬畏.

sentences.en: If you’re lucky enough to live near some woods, or a mountain, or a canyon, go hiking.
sentences.cn: 如果你很幸运，能够生活在靠近森林、群山或是峡谷的地方，那就去徒步旅行吧。

sentences.en: In the desert, a canyon that snakes through the landscape could also prevent crossing without creating an eyesore.
sentences.cn: 在沙漠中，一个蜿蜒地穿过景观的峡谷也可以让视线穿过而没有任何障碍。

sentences.en: Made of plywood Okoume, this lightweight pieces are constructed by a series of layers rings pile up together, simulating the shape of a canyon or mountain.
sentences.cn: 这套轻质家具由奥古曼产的胶合板制作而成。他们是由一层层的圆环累积而成，模拟出峡谷或山的形状。

sentences.en: The canyon is famous for producing echoes.
sentences.cn: 这个峡谷以回声而闻名.

sentences.en: The canyon yawned before him.
sentences.cn: 峡谷在他前面开着大口.

sentences.en: The glacier scooped a canyon out of rocks.
sentences.cn: 冰河在礁石中冲出了一条河谷.

sentences.en: The Grand Canyon is one of the sights of the world.
sentences.cn: (科罗拉多)大峡谷是世界名胜之一.

sentences.en: The grand canyon was not dug by the hand of man, but riven by nature.
sentences.cn: 大峡谷并非人力所开而是受大自然之力而成的。

sentences.en: The grandeur of the Grand Canyon transcends description.
sentences.cn: 大峡谷的宏伟不是笔墨所能形容的.

sentences.en: The trail zigzagged down the abrupt descent of the canyon.
sentences.cn: 这条小路弯弯曲曲的顺着峡谷那陡削的下坡蜿蜒而下.

sentences.en: There are several tours of the Grand Canyon.
sentences.cn: 到大峡谷有好几个旅游团.

sentences.en: They lived over around Coyote Canyon someplace.
sentences.cn: 他们住在凯奥特峡谷一带。

sentences.en: We hiked the Grand Canyon, exploring Indian cliff dwellings.
sentences.cn: 我们去大峡谷徒步旅行，探究印第安人的崖居。

sentences.en: We made our way up the fixed rope and then down into a deeper third canyon.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着固定的绳索前进，然后到达了一个更深的峡谷，这已经是第三个了。

sentences.en: Yes. It's a great way to really see the canyon.
sentences.cn: 真的.那是真正参观峡谷的好方式.

sentences.en: You could hike through the Fish River Canyon.
sentences.cn: 你可以徒步穿越鱼河峡谷。

trans.tran_en: a deep valley with very steep sides of rock that usually has a river running through it
